translations: n．稀有物品，罕见事物：不常见的、稀有的物品或现象。
· These stamps are considered rarities among collectors.
这些邮票被收藏家认为是稀有物品。

sentences.sentence: His collection of plants contains many rarities.
sentences.translation: 他收藏的植物包括许多稀有品种。

sentences.sentence: Telephones and TV sets were rarities.
sentences.translation: 电话和电视机是稀罕东西。

sentences.sentence: In short, she was one of those rarities of modern civilized society—a genuine girl.
sentences.translation: 总而言之，唐小姐是摩登文明社会里那桩罕物——一个真正的女孩子。
